full_text: RT @tyler: First they ignore you, then suddenly Paraguay 🇵🇾, Argentina 🇦🇷, Panama 🇵🇦, Brazil 🇧🇷, El Salvador 🇸🇻, and Nicaragua 🇳🇮 embrace #…
